proj.zoie.impl.indexing.internal
类 BatchedIndexDataLoader<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D>

java.lang.Object
  proj.zoie.impl.indexing.internal.BatchedIndexDataLoader<R,D>
类型参数：
R -
V -
所有已实现的接口：
DataConsumer<D>
直接已知子类：
RealtimeIndexDataLoader
public class BatchedIndexDataLoader<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D>
extends Object
implements DataConsumer<D>

Runs a background thread that flushes incoming data events in batch to the background DataConsumer. Incoming data is buffered first. A flush is carried out when the batch size is significant, a client requesting a flush, or significant amount of time has passed. The data is flushed to the underlying dataloader, which is a DataConsumer. When incoming data comes in too fast, the thread sending data will be put on hold. This acts as incoming data throttling.

consume

public void consume(Collection<DataConsumer.DataEvent<D>> events)
             throws ZoieException
从接口 DataConsumer 复制的描述
Consumption of a collection of data events. Note that this method may have a side effect. That is it may empty the Collection passed in after execution. It is good practice if the data collection along with its contents passed to consume(data) never changed by client code later. We also strengthen the contract on this method that the events in data are sorted according to their version numbers and if consume is invoked on collection1 before on collection2, then all the max version number for events in collection1 must be smaller than the min version number for events in collection2.

指定者：
接口 DataConsumer<D> 中的 consume
参数：
events - A collection of data to be consumed.
抛出：
ZoieException
另请参见：
DataConsumer.consume(java.util.Collection)

getCurrentBatchSize

public int getCurrentBatchSize()

getBatchList

protected List<DataConsumer.DataEvent<ZoieIndexable>> getBatchList()
This method needs to be called within a synchronized block on 'this'.

返回：
the list of data events already received. A new list is created to receive new data events.

flushEvents

public void flushEvents(long timeOut)
                 throws ZoieException
Wait for timeOut amount of time for the indexing thread to process data events. If there are still remaining unprocessed events by the end of timeOut duration, a ZoieException is thrown.

参数：
timeOut - a timeout value in milliseconds.
抛出：
ZoieException

processBatch

protected void processBatch()
Used by the indexing thread to flush incoming data events in batch. A flush is carried out when the batch size is significant, a client requesting a flush, or significant amount of time has passed. The data is flushed to the underlying dataloader, which is a DataConsumer.

start

public void start()
Starts the build-in indexing thread.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shutdown the build-in indexing thread and wait until it dies.

getVersion

public String getVersion()
从接口 DataConsumer 复制的描述
This method is not meant to be Thread-Safe, since that could add significant complexity and performance issue. When Thread-Safety is desired, the client should add external synchronization.

指定者：
接口 DataConsumer<D> 中的 getVersion
返回：
the version number of events that it has received but not necessarily processed.
